item.title: Short note about tidyeval
item.description: Following Jenny Bryan’s talk on tidyeval in the last rstudio::conf 2019, I decided to write this short note (mainly as a reminder to myself). What is tidyeval? Tidy evaluation, or non standard evaluation, allows us to pass column names between functions. This is the “classic” behaviour of most tidyverse functions. For example, we use: library(tidyverse) mtcars %>% select(mpg, cyl) ## mpg cyl ## Mazda RX4 21.0 6 ## Mazda RX4 Wag 21.
